entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Alex, and I'm happy to help you today. How can I assist you?
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I want to return this VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's junk!
I understand your frustration, and I apologize for the wait time. I can certainly help you with a return. Can I please get your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order... Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Can you tell me why you'd like to return it?
It doesn't work! The heart rate monitor is completely inaccurate. It's supposed to be a smart watch that tracks my activity, but it's basically useless. I've only had it a couple of weeks.

I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the VeloBand Pulse. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase for a full refund. Since you're well within that timeframe, I'll go ahead and process the return for you. Did you want to return for refund or exchange for another smart watch?
Just a refund. This VeloBand Pulse experience has soured me on the whole thing.

Understood. I've processed a refund for the full purchase price. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within 24 hours. Once we receive the VeloBand Pulse, the refund will be credited back to your original method of payment. This usually takes 7-10 business days.
Okay, that sounds good. So, I just print the label, stick it on the box, and ship it back?

Exactly. And keep the tracking information for your records. To clarify our return policy, you'll have 90 days from today to get it back to us. However, the refund should be initiated much sooner than that once we receive the package.
Alright, thank you so much! I appreciate you taking care of this so quickly. The last person I talked to was useless.

You're very welcome. I'm glad I could help. Is there anything else I can assist you with today regarding your VeloFit account or any other VeloFit products? Perhaps another smart watch with different features?
No, I think that's all. Thanks again!

You're welcome! Have a great day and thank you for choosing VeloFit! Remember, you can always find details on our return policy, including specifics on the VeloBand Pulse, on our website. But don't worry about it for now!
